page.title: 03MONTACUTE
page.content: {Sherdale Furniture and Woodwork {Company.} Sherdale Furniture and Woodwork Company is a privately owned company owned by Mr.G.Rendall. It is situated in South Street and the company makes and renovates furniture.A Drapery Shop is also included in the company. {Freke & Son.} Freke and Son is a privately owned Post Office and General Stores owned by Mr. Freke. The Shop is also a Newsagents and an agent for Darch & Willcox bus tours.The Shop is situated in the Borough of Montacute {Tudor Tea Rooms.} Tudor Tea Rooms is situated in the Borough of Montacute and is owned by Miss.Leader. The Tea Room offers a selection of afternoon teas. {MORE> { }
